name.text: Slam Horse Live:  The Ride Hard Experience (18+ show)
name.html: Slam Horse Live:  The Ride Hard Experience (18+ show)

description.text:
Slam Horse’s next big show is coming August 24th!  Tickets are on sale now!  Here are some details…
 AN EPIC DAY OF EXCITEMENT!
Don't miss Slam Horse and the Slam Ponies in their first public performance since the 2014 LIES show!  The artist who brought you such powerhouse songs as: 
“Bone” 
“Hornymoon”  
“Stallion”  
“Fireflies” 
“Finally Getting Nowhere”  
“Lickity Splits”  
“Bong Hits” 
“Video Game” 
“HFY” 
“Summer Party” 
“Dürdy Thängz” & 
“LIES”… 
is once again delivering the hits, deep cuts, and brand new songs his fans crave!  Slam and the Ponies will be performing for 4 hours! 

Strap-in for a non-stop island-themed party!!
 
We’re having SO much fun creating this show for you!  And, you’re going to LOVE experiencing it!  
 

NEXT LEVEL!
Slam is known for putting on epic concerts, and this one takes it to the next level.  Two years in the making, this show is an over-the-top extravaganza!  Slam lovingly and painstakingly attended to every detail of this production to create an entire world for you to step into and enjoy!  Complete with characters, scenes, backdrops, props, audience participation, and more…all built around the show theme, to advance the exciting storyline!  
 
This concert is a boutique mini-“festival” taking place in Plainfield, IL, one hour south of Chicago.  This is Slam's first show in five years, and he won't be taking this show on the road.  This is your chance to see the artist known for immersion theater!  This show is worth traveling in for from out-of-state and from outside the U.S.  Think of it like you’re going to an amusement park or festival for a day of fun!  You’ll want to free up your entire day for this event, and budget at least $20 - $50 of spending money per person for food, drinks, and merchandise.  The fun begins when you board the complimentary shuttle at your designated time slot in the afternoon.  Later that evening, after the concert is over, the shuttle will drop you off back at the parking lot, whenever you wish to leave the after-party.  
 
You deserve a day of fun!  Don't miss this absolutely incredible experience!!  
 
Get your tickets to the Ride Hard Experience now! 
  
THE “EXPERIENCE”
It’s fun trying to describe The Ride Hard Experience….  
this adventure engages all of your senses with an exotic blend of the following elements:  

Hawaiian island luau party
escape-room
treasure hunt
variety show
live role-play
haunted house
audience participation
puppet show
immersion theater
sci-fi play
circus
murder-mystery
wandering minstrels
mascots
carnival
improv
cosplay
short film
exotic dance
scavenger hunt
whodunit
comedy
drama
action-adventure
macabre
alien lore
period work
conspiracy theories
chance elements
just the right amount of "camp"
festival
VIP party, &
live concert!  

 
This is Slam Horse’s “patented” immersion theater at its best, with the added twist this time of audience participation!  Rooted in Slam’s favorite— absurdist comedy, this show pushes the boundaries, creating zany, unforgettable characters in compromising situations!  And YOU will be right in the center of the action!    
 
The Ride Hard Experience will feature: 

Slam Horse performing live in concert, along with… 
the Slam Pony dancers, 
the Slactors (Slam Horse’s private acting troupe), 
a screen show, 
a light show, 
special effects, 
& more!  

 
A FEW FUN FACTS:
        •  You will hear brand new Slam songs!
        •  Slam built a custom 100-piece lighting & effects rig for this show!

He wrote highly articulated lighting scripts for each number!  
The show has over 100 costume changes!
The performance features an elaborate screen show!
Extensive work has gone into making the venue look like another world… you’ll feel like you can lose yourself in a distant place and time!  Whether you're standing in line waiting to get in, buying food at concessions, enjoying intermission, or watching the concert, the immersion theater experience constantly surrounds you!  Much like at a Renaissance Fair.   

 
The full experience unfolds from the… 

shuttle bus… to the
pre-party… to the
concert… to the
intermissions… to the
after-party, 

with key elements of the story being constantly revealed as the day progresses.  
 
Whereas Slam’s LIES show was primarily a dramatic work, the Ride Hard Experience is predominantly a comedy show, which also involves drama and action.  You will be an active participant in a crazy, evolving story!      
 
Get Your Tickets Now!
 
 WHY YOU’RE BEING SUMMONED TO THIS EVENT
So, here’s what happened…  Slam Horse was working diligently, conducting top-secret research for the XIA.  After running experiments for many months, he finally succeeded in opening up a time-space portal!  Slam sent multiple teams of Pony Patrol Agents through the portal, and one-by-one they all disappeared.  Over the next 22 months, he sent many XIA Agents through to investigate the situation.  They also mysteriously disappeared.  Slam Horse, himself, finally went through the portal to attempt a rescue mission, and he has not been seen since.  That’s why we need your help!
 
Slam was able to send back a single communication, and after that, we lost contact with him.  Intelligence based on Slam’s communiqué indicates the time-space portal leads to Mars, 4.8 billion years ago, when the red planet had water, and could sustain life.  Intelligence analysts at the Xenomorph Intelligence Agency believe Slam and the Ponies are there, and that they are being held captive, like pets.  They are likely being forced to perform their music for the amusement of their captors, on an island in the Elysium Sea, on Mars.  Unfortunately, a hostile race of aliens has taken Mars over, and is terraforming it.  Worst of all, the hostile aliens’ next stop is believed to be the Earth, where intelligence indicates they plan to do the same thing here, draining the life out of our planet, and enslaving the human race!  
 
You will be traveling through a time-space portal to another planet, almost 5 billion years into the past, where you will land on ancient Mars!  The portal exits to an island that is the tallest mountain in the entire galaxy!  Isolated by thousands of miles of open ocean, and ransacked by space pirates, the entire mysterious island is an active volcano!  
 
Here on Earth we measure time in terms of B.C.E. and A.C.E.  The Martians, however, measure their time in terms of B.E. (before eruption) and A.E. (after eruption)!  You don’t want to get vaporized by a steam vent!
 
Fans are cast as XIA Agents, who must go in undercover.  Your cover story is that you are a Slam Horse fan who's going to an island-themed party to see Slam Horse performing live on Isle of Vulgaria, Mars.   
 
The mountain-volcano-island known geologically as Elysium Mons, is home to the peace-loving Luxorian “aliens.”  (They’re aliens to us, but to them, they’re just Luxorians, of course).  The beautiful Isle of Luxoria has been taken over by the invading Vulgarians.  The Vulgarians renamed the island Isle of Vulgaria, and they are using this island as their base of operations while they terraform Mars.  They are setting in motion events that will ultimately destroy the planet...unless some brave souls are courageous enough to step in and help!  
 
Your secret mission is to: 

rescue Slam and the Ponies, 
save the day for the indigenous inhabitants, the Luxorians, 
defeat the Vulgarian overlords’ agenda, 
save Mars from becoming the barren planet we know it as today, &
protect the Earth from suffering the same fate! 

Don’t worry, there are snacks ;-)

Along the way you’ll meet the peaceful indigenous alien inhabitants known as the Luxorians.  You’ll probably also come face-to-face with the hostile alien overlords, the Vulgarians.  You’ll be bumping into fellow humans as well.  They likely stumbled into a time-space wormhole some time ago, and will probably have been stranded on Mars for many generations by the time you get there.  Those humans have been inbreeding the whole time, and are known as “Genies,” because their gene pool leaves them fit for little else other than providing comedy relief!  You’ll also be interacting with gorgeous Slam Pony Patrol Agents, and badass XIA Agents!   
 
We've deciphered the aliens' languages, social customs, manners of behavior, religious beliefs, and more.  You will learn about them in your briefing.  You will feel like you've gotten to know these beings.
 
PASSPORTS
The Far Out Trips travel agency is secretly run by the Xenomorph Intelligence Agency and the Global Bureau of Portals.  Far Out Trips will book your vacation to ancient Mars for you, backstop your cover story, and will also provide you with your Intergalactic Passport.  An undercover XIA Agent will issue Your IP (Intergalactic Passport) to you once you arrive at the venue.  You will need to have your visa stamped at several different ports of entry while on Mars.  You cannot engage in interdimensional travel without an Intergalactic Passport!  If you have any questions, you may call Far Out Trips Travel Agency at 630-492-0154.     

MISSION BRIEFING/ REQUIRED SHUTTLE 
Parking at the venue is limited to personnel only.  Fans will park at the free parking lot at the Plainfield Public Library located at 15025 S Illinois St, Plainfield, IL 60544.  A complimentary Slam Horse shuttle will pick you up at the free parking lot, and take you to the venue, which is less than a mile away, also in Plainfield, IL.  (Due to the M.L.T., or, multi-layered time-space, the venue is actually located on ancient Mars, once you pass through the Time-Space Portal.)  Exact details will be revealed to you once you have the proper security clearance (which simply requires that you purchase a ticket)! 
In addition to offering our esteemed guests convenience, the shuttle is also an important requirement.  Once aboard the shuttle, an XIA Agent will brief you on your “mission” en route to the venue.  Afternoon shuttle pick-up times will be emailed to you after you have purchased your ticket(s).  Your shuttle pick-up time will most likely fall between 2-4 p.m., depending upon to which group you are assigned.  If you purchase more than one ticket on your order, all the people in your group will be placed in the same shuttle group whenever possible. 
Please note that the “immersion theater” experience begins on the shuttle.  You’ll need to be aboard to receive your mission briefing.  The briefing sets up the entire experience, reveals information, and gives you important physical clues, to help you navigate your way through the escape room, “haunted house,” & scavenger hunt.  Even though the venue is less than a mile from the parking lot, the driver will take the scenic route, so that the XIA Agent will have the necessary 15 minutes or so to give you your briefing.  You may enjoy the complimentary beverages aboard the shuttle, to spice up your party-journey, while you learn about what mysteries lie ahead!   
 
 ALIEN MONEY
Food, beverages, and concert merchandise will be available at the venue for a donation.  The venue (being on another planet) will obviously not accept Earth money, including U.S. Dollars.  Once you pass through the Time-Space Portal, you will have the opportunity to do a money exchange.  You will cash in your U.S. Dollars for Elysian Dongies.  Dongies are the metal coin currency used by the pirates of the Elysium Sea, on Mars. 
After the invading Vulgarian overlords made the indigenous Luxorians’ currency illegal, pirate money arose as the main currency on-island.  Gold coins are worth $10.  Silver coins are $5.  Bronze coins are $1.  Luckily the exchange rate of USD to E> is 1:1, and tends to remain fairly stable over time.  You will exchange your money at the Interstellar Bank of Vulgaria.  Only cash & credit cards are accepted to purchase Elysian Dongies.  
  
FOOD AND DRINK
The venue—The Penetralium, is located on the Isle of Vulgaria, in the Elysium Sea, about 3,000 miles west of Tharsis, on Mars, 4.8 billion years ago.  The Penetralium Arena is located underground in the Labian Mines.  The Penetralium includes two areas for concessions:  The Pony Hole Cantina (in the Lower Labian Mines), and the Club 69 VIP Lounge (in the Upper Labian Mines). 
According to intelligence, the Vulgarians were so taken with the beauty and exotic ways of the Ponies, that they named the concession area at the Penetralium Arena after them.  They named it “The Pony Hole Cantina,” in their reverence. 
Slam Horse built the Club 69 VIP Lounge in case any humans came to Mars from the Earth, so they would have somewhere to hang out that was relatively free from aliens.  “Relatively” free being the operative word. 
Be sure to purchase an upgraded ticket if you want VIP Lounge access!  
 
Concessions include gourmet island food and drinks, as well as stadium-style food and beverages.  Food and drinks are available in the Pony Hole Cantina as well as in the Club 69 VIP Lounge.  
 
Pony Shelly is our resident chef.  She is known as the World’s Horniest Chef.  Pony Shelly loves food, and she loves making food for the people she loves!  You will likely feel loved when you eat her food.  Her gourmet creations have been described as "an orgasm for your mouth."  It’s hard to explain, and incredible to experience.  Her food is exciting & inspiring!     
 Pony Hole Cantina Offerings…
 
OUR GOURMET ELIXIR:  THE PONY TAIL
Slam and the Ponies along with some culinary specialists spent several months perfecting an original drink they developed just for this show.  They crafted it with love until every single taste-tester on the team gave it a “9” or a “10.”  It’s an island cocktail called a “Pony Tail,” and it’s delicious!  Some of the ingredients are:

Dark rum, 
mango rum, 
banana rum, 
imported Hawaiian macadamia nut liquor, 
blackberry brandy, 
pineapple juice, 
orange juice, 
pomegranate juice,
freshly-squeezed lime juice, 
coconut cream, &
a splash of Jamaican Appleton rum on top.

These are some of the ingredients that make this new island drink exciting for your tongue! 
The Pony Tail is served with multiple garnishes to titillate your senses:

Fruit:  orange, maraschino cherry, pineapple, blackberry, & mango
Flower:  edible hibiscus & dianthus flowers
Mineral:  edible gold flakes
Chef’s signature garnish:  a playful banana-dolphin 
Served with Hawaiian umbrella & bamboo straw in gold-rimmed glass!
The dry ice fog effect puts this mystical Martian drink over-the-top!  

   Must try!!
 
 HUMANO GOURMET SANDWICH
Also in the Pony Hole Cantina, you may enjoy our gourmet “Humano” island sandwich.  It’s a classic Cubano with a twist.  The aliens make this Cubano.  The name “Humano” makes it sound a little suspicious… and, it’s delicious nonetheless!  
It includes:

Smoked Pork, marinated in lime juice & cilantro,
grilled, marinated pineapple, 
dressed jicama,
shredded cabbage and green apple with fennel,
Chef Pony Shelly’s custom Cosmic Orgasm dip…
all served on fresh, homemade “dill-dough” bread (shaped suggestively)!  

 The aliens serve each “Humano” sandwich with a little sign on a spear, displaying names like, “Bob,” “Susan,” or “Jeff.”  Those aren’t the names of the people who ordered the sandwich.  And those aren’t the names of the people who made the sandwich.  We’re not sure who those people are.  Come to think of it, many humans have become stranded on Mars, and have disappeared.  But, the aliens reassure us that the names on the “Humanos” are placed there in reverence of the human race, and the sacrifices they have made.  It’s probably nothing.  Enjoy!
 
SNACKS

Sticky Fingers:  ginger chicken fingers wrapped in bamboo shoots, served on a bamboo stick, with gourmet dipping sauce.

 
GOURMET DESSERTS

Trojan Banana
Eruption Cake
Decadent Chocolate Mousse

 
If Gourmet’s Not Your Thing, We’ve Got You Covered…
 Stadium-style food at The Penetralium includes:

sliders, 
hot dogs,
grilled vegetarian hotdogs,
Hot Wiener Slide—A combo including a hot dog with two mini sliders on round buns. 

Snacks include: 

nachos-n-cheese, 
fresh movie theater style popcorn, 
snow cones (five popular flavors of Hawaiian shaved ice), 
cotton candy, & 
imported Hawaiian chocolate-covered Macadamia Nuts.    

 We will also have:

Maui Gold Pineapple Beer
Radio Free Pilsner
non-alcoholic beer
pinot Grigio
merlot
soft drinks
diet soda, &
Hawaiian Volcanic Water.  

 
CLUB 69 VIP LOUNGE
In addition to the Pony Hole Cantina, the Penetralium Arena also offers the Club 69 VIP Lounge (for VIP ticket holders only).  The Lounge has items that are exclusively available to VIP’s.  VIP guests may also order from the Pony Hole Cantina, and have it delivered to the VIP Lounge.

THE VIP LOUNGE INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING ITEMS:
Complimentary—

Moët & Chandon Brut Imperial Champagne
Caviar and Toast Points
A variety of hors d’oeuvres
Decadent cheeses, gourmet crackers, & fruit preserves
Alien Bones (Chocolate & Butterscotch melted over chow mein noodles.  Simple & delicious!)  
Imported Hawaiian chocolate-covered macadamia nuts
& additional sundries.

For a donation of Elysian Dongies:

Prosecco Sparkling Wine
Pony Beer
Horse Heaven Hills Red Blend
Pinot Grigio
Merlot &
Hawaiian Volcanic Water.

 
Food, beverages and merchandise will be available any time Slam is not performing, including during the Pre-Party, Intermissions, & After-Party (until last call).  Both the Pony Hole Cantina and the Club 69 VIP Lounge will be closed while Slam is on stage.  Must be 21+ with valid photo I.D. to drink alcohol.  No outside food or drink will be permitted on the shuttle or at the venue. 
 
Pony Shelly, the World’s Horniest Chef, has been overseeing the development of the menu for this show since 7 months prior to the show date.  She will be making many exciting culinary additions between now and the show.  She will also be on premises during the show, overseeing food prep, the culinary team, the Pony Hole Cantina, & the Club 69 VIP Lounge.  
 
Seating for this show is limited!  Get your Tickets NOW!  

THE FLOW
The Shuttle Bus ride is where your briefing will take place.  The Pre-Party starts as soon as the Shuttle drops you at the venue.  You will need to use the Pre-Party to: 

get through the “Haunted House;” 
make it through the Escape Room; 
find the Time-Space Portal, and successfully pass through it to ancient Mars; &... 
once there, navigate the Scavenger Hunt to find necessary clues to fulfill your undercover mission!  

 Remember:  You’re on an important mission, and the worlds are counting on you!  No one will be able to stop you from having fun with it though…despite the presence of the Vulgarian Sentries.  There are no fun-police on Mars, per se.  It’s doubtful the Vulgarians even know what fun is.  They’re so serious all the time, making the indigenous Luxorians work in the Labian Mines, where they toil away, mining for cheese.  Maybe you can teach the Vulgarians how to let their hair down, and crack a smile.  Or, rather, grow some hair…and a mouth.  
 
 The Pre-Party will also feature:

themed characters, 
musical performers, 
gourmet themed food & drinks available for a donation of Elysian Dongies, 
Slam Horse’s “patented” interactive immersion-theater experience, 
themed alien games (optional), including futuristic games that electrically shock your fingers when you lose! (only for the bravest earthlings!)*
and more! 

*”Shock games” are not suitable for individuals with epilepsy, pace maker, heart condition, high blood pressure, or those individuals sensitive to stress.
 Those who haven’t figured out how to get back to Earth by the end of the pre-party, will have to use the intermissions, and after-party, if necessary, to finish finding the necessary clues!  There will be undercover agents ready to help you in your mission.   
 
DRUM SOLO
The Ride Hard Experience will also include Slam Horse’s special-feature performance-art drum solo!  This is the first time in over 20 years that Slam has written and performed a drum solo.  In order to come out of drum solo “retirement,” he needed a challenge.  To that end, Slam re-imagined and redefined what a drum solo can be.  You’ll never see a solo like this anywhere else!  He will be playing this on a 120-piece drum set that he custom-designed just for the Ride Hard Experience!  An experience unto itself, the solo will involve narration, live actors, and a screen show.    
 
TICKET LEVELS…
Pre-Sale with Free VIP Upgrade $39.99.  
Pre-Sale has ended.

The Stallion.  $39.99  
The Stallion Level Ticket includes:

general admission seating for the concert (anywhere except reserved seats),
access to the “haunted house,” escape room, & scavenger hunt, 
free parking, & 
free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (round trip).

 
The Hornymoon.  $49.99  
The Hornymoon Level ticket includes:

Club 69 VIP Lounge Access,
a complimentary Slam Horse bottle-opener keychain, 
general admission seating (anywhere except reserved seats), 
access to the “haunted house,” escape room, and scavenger hunt,
free parking, &  
free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (round trip).

 
The Club 69 VIP Lounge is a comfortable space to get away from it all, and relax.  Sofas and lazy boy recliners instead of metal chairs.  High-end beverages, with a complimentary spread, including caviar, champagne & hors d’oeuvres.  Concierge.  Pony Appearances.  
(See “Food and Drinks” section for a more complete listing.)
 
The HFY.  $59.99  
The HFY Level Ticket includes: 

a reserved front row seat for the concert, 
backstage pass, 
Club 69 VIP Lounge access, 
a Slam Horse T-Shirt,  
first beverage complimentary,
access to the “haunted house,” escape room, and scavenger hunt,
free parking, & 
free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (round trip). 

There are only a few HFY-level tickets left!  
           
The Nookie Monster.  $99.99 
SOLD OUT!

Your personal choice of beverage waiting for you on the shuttle and at the venue (such as a favorite beer or soda, as availability allows).  Call Far Out Trips travel agency to coordinate:  630-492-0154)
Slam Horse Q&A:  You will have an opportunity to hang out with Slam at intermission
Brunch with Slam the morning before the show (complimentary for out-of-state / out-of country guests)
Pony Privileges:  you will have an opportunity to hang out in the Pony Barn while the Ponies are changing costumes
a reserved front row seat for the concert, 
backstage pass, 
Your own private VIP Lounge with hostess,
Club 69 VIP Lounge access, 
a Slam Horse T-Shirt (signed by Slam),  
three complimentary beverages,
one complimentary food item (such as a gourmet sandwich), 
access to the “haunted house,” escape room, and scavenger hunt
free parking, &  
free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (including return trip).

Nookie Monster-level tickets are SOLD OUT!  


Please note:  You must be 18+ to attend this show; 21+ to drink alcohol.  Valid Photo ID is required at the shuttle and at the venue.

 
OUT-OF-STATE/OVERSEAS GUESTS
For those who require a plane flight or many hours of driving time to arrive in town, it is strongly recommended that you arrive a day early for this event.  For out-of-state/out-of-country guests, Slam Horse can arrange a block of hotel rooms in nearby Joliet, IL (less than 10 minutes drive from the venue & the free parking lot).  Please contact us ASAP if you need us to set this up.  The special hotline number for any inquiries about this show, including lodging, is:  630-492-0154 (Far Out Trips travel agency).  Guests will have to provide their own transportation from the motel to the free parking lot where the free shuttle will pick you up.  
 
SUMMARY
In summary, guests from out of state/country are recommended to arrive the day before the event.  All guests should arrive at the free parking lot at the Plainfield Public Library on August 24th at their designated time.  Your shuttle time will most likely fall between 2-4 p.m., depending upon to which group you are assigned.  Your shuttle time will be issued to you via email or standard mail, after you have purchased your tickets.  The venue is less than a mile away from the parking lot, and the shuttle will take the scenic route for about 15 minutes while an XIA agent on board briefs you on your mission, and gives you important clues.  Upon arriving at the venue, you will have to: 

liaise with an undercover XIA agent (whom you will have to find!), 
make it through the “haunted house,”
survive an escape room, 
get through the time-space portal, 
exchange your U.S. Dollars for Elysian Dongies, 
find necessary clues in a scavenger hunt,  
work with Pony Patrol Agents, and XIA Agents to figure out a way to save the day, & 
find a way to get back to Earth!  

 
The show itself is chock full of surprises, comedy sketches, and whimsical delights, as are the intermissions, pre-party, and after-party.  By the way, the after-party is a pajama party, so you may wish to bring an appropriate change of clothes!  (Regular attire also permitted).  
 
GET YOUR TICKETS NOW!!
 
You Have No Idea What's In Store!
Slam and the Ponies spent two years making sure this event will be stellar down to the last detail.  There is so much more to it than what we’ve shared here, but we can’t spoil all the surprises!  You have no idea what you’re in store for!  It is out of Slam’s great love for his fans that he and his team of Ponies, contract workers, & volunteers have put together this show for you.  This concert is all about the fans being the center of attention, and having a great time!  We’re looking greatly forward to seeing you on August 24th!  Remember, by the time you are reading this, Slam and the Ponies are stuck on the red planet, and they need your help!!
 
You can call the hotline number at any time if you have questions.  The hotline number is run by Far Out Trips Travel Agency:  630-492-0154.  This number will also be emailed to you after you have purchased your tickets. 
 
Have a wonderful day, and we’ll see you on August 24th! 
 
You must be 18+ to attend this show; 21+ to drink alcohol.  Valid Photo ID is required at the shuttle and at the venue.  No outside food or drink permitted.  
 
Please note:  If the August 24th show date becomes sold out, please contact us at:  630-492-0154, and also add your name to the wait-list on www.eventbrite.com.  With sufficient interest, we will add additional dates for the Ride Hard Experience!
 
Warning:  This show will feature flashing lights that may not be suitable for persons with epilepsy.
 
This event is not handicap accessible.
 
All details are subject to change without notice.
 
Get your tickets NOW before the show sells out!  See you on August 24th!
UPDATE:  Due to fast moving and ambiguous intelligence being gathered from XIA Agents in the field, some information in this top secret briefing may be inaccurate.  After discussions with Planetary Geologists, it is unclear if Slam Horse and his team of Pony Patrol Agents are trapped on Elysium Mons or Olympus Mons.  We have also determined that Olympus Mons is the tallest volcano in the universe, not Elysium Mons, as stated in the briefing.  We will update you as soon as we acquire new intelligence.  In the meantime, remain alert.  
--Hugh Mann, Deputy Director of Xenomorph Intelligence
description.html:
Slam Horse’s next big show is coming August 24th!  Tickets are on sale now!  Here are some details…

 AN EPIC DAY OF EXCITEMENT!

Don't miss Slam Horse and the Slam Ponies in their first public performance since the 2014 LIES show!  The artist who brought you such powerhouse songs as:

“Bone”

“Hornymoon”  

“Stallion”  

“Fireflies”

“Finally Getting Nowhere” 

“Lickity Splits” 

“Bong Hits”

“Video Game”

“HFY”

“Summer Party”

“Dürdy Thängz” &

“LIES”…

is once again delivering the hits, deep cuts, and brand new songs his fans crave!  Slam and the Ponies will be performing for 4 hours! 


Strap-in for a non-stop island-themed party!!

 

We’re having SO much fun creating this show for you!  And, you’re going to LOVE experiencing it! 

 


NEXT LEVEL!

Slam is known for putting on epic concerts, and this one takes it to the next level.  Two years in the making, this show is an over-the-top extravaganza!  Slam lovingly and painstakingly attended to every detail of this production to create an entire world for you to step into and enjoy!  Complete with characters, scenes, backdrops, props, audience participation, and more…all built around the show theme, to advance the exciting storyline! 

 

This concert is a boutique mini-“festival” taking place in Plainfield, IL, one hour south of Chicago.  This is Slam's first show in five years, and he won't be taking this show on the road.  This is your chance to see the artist known for immersion theater!  This show is worth traveling in for from out-of-state and from outside the U.S.  Think of it like you’re going to an amusement park or festival for a day of fun!  You’ll want to free up your entire day for this event, and budget at least $20 - $50 of spending money per person for food, drinks, and merchandise.  The fun begins when you board the complimentary shuttle at your designated time slot in the afternoon.  Later that evening, after the concert is over, the shuttle will drop you off back at the parking lot, whenever you wish to leave the after-party. 

 

You deserve a day of fun!  Don't miss this absolutely incredible experience!! 

 

Get your tickets to the Ride Hard Experience now! 

  

THE “EXPERIENCE”

It’s fun trying to describe The Ride Hard Experience…. 

this adventure engages all of your senses with an exotic blend of the following elements: 

  • Hawaiian island luau party
  • escape-room
  • treasure hunt
  • variety show
  • live role-play
  • haunted house
  • audience participation
  • puppet show
  • immersion theater
  • sci-fi play
  • circus
  • murder-mystery
  • wandering minstrels
  • mascots
  • carnival
  • improv
  • cosplay
  • short film
  • exotic dance
  • scavenger hunt
  • whodunit
  • comedy
  • drama
  • action-adventure
  • macabre
  • alien lore
  • period work
  • conspiracy theories
  • chance elements
  • just the right amount of "camp"
  • festival
  • VIP party, &
  • live concert! 

 

This is Slam Horse’s “patented” immersion theater at its best, with the added twist this time of audience participation!  Rooted in Slam’s favorite— absurdist comedy, this show pushes the boundaries, creating zany, unforgettable characters in compromising situations!  And YOU will be right in the center of the action!   

 

The Ride Hard Experience will feature:

  • Slam Horse performing live in concert, along with…
  • the Slam Pony dancers,
  • the Slactors (Slam Horse’s private acting troupe),
  • a screen show,
  • a light show,
  • special effects,
  • & more! 

 

A FEW FUN FACTS:

        •  You will hear brand new Slam songs!

        •  Slam built a custom 100-piece lighting & effects rig for this show!

  • He wrote highly articulated lighting scripts for each number! 
  • The show has over 100 costume changes!
  • The performance features an elaborate screen show!
  • Extensive work has gone into making the venue look like another world… you’ll feel like you can lose yourself in a distant place and time!  Whether you're standing in line waiting to get in, buying food at concessions, enjoying intermission, or watching the concert, the immersion theater experience constantly surrounds you!  Much like at a Renaissance Fair.  

 

The full experience unfolds from the…

  • shuttle bus… to the
  • pre-party… to the
  • concert… to the
  • intermissions… to the
  • after-party,

with key elements of the story being constantly revealed as the day progresses. 

 

Whereas Slam’s LIES show was primarily a dramatic work, the Ride Hard Experience is predominantly a comedy show, which also involves drama and action.  You will be an active participant in a crazy, evolving story!     

 

Get Your Tickets Now!

 

 WHY YOU’RE BEING SUMMONED TO THIS EVENT

So, here’s what happened…  Slam Horse was working diligently, conducting top-secret research for the XIA.  After running experiments for many months, he finally succeeded in opening up a time-space portal!  Slam sent multiple teams of Pony Patrol Agents through the portal, and one-by-one they all disappeared.  Over the next 22 months, he sent many XIA Agents through to investigate the situation.  They also mysteriously disappeared.  Slam Horse, himself, finally went through the portal to attempt a rescue mission, and he has not been seen since.  That’s why we need your help!

 

Slam was able to send back a single communication, and after that, we lost contact with him.  Intelligence based on Slam’s communiqué indicates the time-space portal leads to Mars, 4.8 billion years ago, when the red planet had water, and could sustain life.  Intelligence analysts at the Xenomorph Intelligence Agency believe Slam and the Ponies are there, and that they are being held captive, like pets.  They are likely being forced to perform their music for the amusement of their captors, on an island in the Elysium Sea, on Mars.  Unfortunately, a hostile race of aliens has taken Mars over, and is terraforming it.  Worst of all, the hostile aliens’ next stop is believed to be the Earth, where intelligence indicates they plan to do the same thing here, draining the life out of our planet, and enslaving the human race! 

 

You will be traveling through a time-space portal to another planet, almost 5 billion years into the past, where you will land on ancient Mars!  The portal exits to an island that is the tallest mountain in the entire galaxy!  Isolated by thousands of miles of open ocean, and ransacked by space pirates, the entire mysterious island is an active volcano! 

 

Here on Earth we measure time in terms of B.C.E. and A.C.E.  The Martians, however, measure their time in terms of B.E. (before eruption) and A.E. (after eruption)!  You don’t want to get vaporized by a steam vent!

 

Fans are cast as XIA Agents, who must go in undercover.  Your cover story is that you are a Slam Horse fan who's going to an island-themed party to see Slam Horse performing live on Isle of Vulgaria, Mars.  

 

The mountain-volcano-island known geologically as Elysium Mons, is home to the peace-loving Luxorian “aliens.”  (They’re aliens to us, but to them, they’re just Luxorians, of course).  The beautiful Isle of Luxoria has been taken over by the invading Vulgarians.  The Vulgarians renamed the island Isle of Vulgaria, and they are using this island as their base of operations while they terraform Mars.  They are setting in motion events that will ultimately destroy the planet...unless some brave souls are courageous enough to step in and help! 

 

Your secret mission is to:

  • rescue Slam and the Ponies,
  • save the day for the indigenous inhabitants, the Luxorians,
  • defeat the Vulgarian overlords’ agenda,
  • save Mars from becoming the barren planet we know it as today, &
  • protect the Earth from suffering the same fate! 

Don’t worry, there are snacks ;-)


Along the way you’ll meet the peaceful indigenous alien inhabitants known as the Luxorians.  You’ll probably also come face-to-face with the hostile alien overlords, the Vulgarians.  You’ll be bumping into fellow humans as well.  They likely stumbled into a time-space wormhole some time ago, and will probably have been stranded on Mars for many generations by the time you get there.  Those humans have been inbreeding the whole time, and are known as “Genies,” because their gene pool leaves them fit for little else other than providing comedy relief!  You’ll also be interacting with gorgeous Slam Pony Patrol Agents, and badass XIA Agents!  

 

We've deciphered the aliens' languages, social customs, manners of behavior, religious beliefs, and more.  You will learn about them in your briefing.  You will feel like you've gotten to know these beings.

 

PASSPORTS

The Far Out Trips travel agency is secretly run by the Xenomorph Intelligence Agency and the Global Bureau of Portals.  Far Out Trips will book your vacation to ancient Mars for you, backstop your cover story, and will also provide you with your Intergalactic Passport.  An undercover XIA Agent will issue Your IP (Intergalactic Passport) to you once you arrive at the venue.  You will need to have your visa stamped at several different ports of entry while on Mars.  You cannot engage in interdimensional travel without an Intergalactic Passport!  If you have any questions, you may call Far Out Trips Travel Agency at 630-492-0154.     


MISSION BRIEFING/ REQUIRED SHUTTLE

Parking at the venue is limited to personnel only.  Fans will park at the free parking lot at the Plainfield Public Library located at 15025 S Illinois St, Plainfield, IL 60544.  A complimentary Slam Horse shuttle will pick you up at the free parking lot, and take you to the venue, which is less than a mile away, also in Plainfield, IL.  (Due to the M.L.T., or, multi-layered time-space, the venue is actually located on ancient Mars, once you pass through the Time-Space Portal.)  Exact details will be revealed to you once you have the proper security clearance (which simply requires that you purchase a ticket)! 

In addition to offering our esteemed guests convenience, the shuttle is also an important requirement.  Once aboard the shuttle, an XIA Agent will brief you on your “mission” en route to the venue.  Afternoon shuttle pick-up times will be emailed to you after you have purchased your ticket(s).  Your shuttle pick-up time will most likely fall between 2-4 p.m., depending upon to which group you are assigned.  If you purchase more than one ticket on your order, all the people in your group will be placed in the same shuttle group whenever possible. 

Please note that the “immersion theater” experience begins on the shuttle.  You’ll need to be aboard to receive your mission briefing.  The briefing sets up the entire experience, reveals information, and gives you important physical clues, to help you navigate your way through the escape room, “haunted house,” & scavenger hunt.  Even though the venue is less than a mile from the parking lot, the driver will take the scenic route, so that the XIA Agent will have the necessary 15 minutes or so to give you your briefing.  You may enjoy the complimentary beverages aboard the shuttle, to spice up your party-journey, while you learn about what mysteries lie ahead!  

 

 ALIEN MONEY

Food, beverages, and concert merchandise will be available at the venue for a donation.  The venue (being on another planet) will obviously not accept Earth money, including U.S. Dollars.  Once you pass through the Time-Space Portal, you will have the opportunity to do a money exchange.  You will cash in your U.S. Dollars for Elysian Dongies.  Dongies are the metal coin currency used by the pirates of the Elysium Sea, on Mars. 

After the invading Vulgarian overlords made the indigenous Luxorians’ currency illegal, pirate money arose as the main currency on-island.  Gold coins are worth $10.  Silver coins are $5.  Bronze coins are $1.  Luckily the exchange rate of USD to E> is 1:1, and tends to remain fairly stable over time.  You will exchange your money at the Interstellar Bank of Vulgaria.  Only cash & credit cards are accepted to purchase Elysian Dongies. 

  

FOOD AND DRINK

The venue—The Penetralium, is located on the Isle of Vulgaria, in the Elysium Sea, about 3,000 miles west of Tharsis, on Mars, 4.8 billion years ago.  The Penetralium Arena is located underground in the Labian Mines.  The Penetralium includes two areas for concessions:  The Pony Hole Cantina (in the Lower Labian Mines), and the Club 69 VIP Lounge (in the Upper Labian Mines). 

According to intelligence, the Vulgarians were so taken with the beauty and exotic ways of the Ponies, that they named the concession area at the Penetralium Arena after them.  They named it “The Pony Hole Cantina,” in their reverence. 

Slam Horse built the Club 69 VIP Lounge in case any humans came to Mars from the Earth, so they would have somewhere to hang out that was relatively free from aliens.  “Relatively” free being the operative word. 

Be sure to purchase an upgraded ticket if you want VIP Lounge access!  

 

Concessions include gourmet island food and drinks, as well as stadium-style food and beverages.  Food and drinks are available in the Pony Hole Cantina as well as in the Club 69 VIP Lounge. 

 

Pony Shelly is our resident chef.  She is known as the World’s Horniest Chef.  Pony Shelly loves food, and she loves making food for the people she loves!  You will likely feel loved when you eat her food.  Her gourmet creations have been described as "an orgasm for your mouth."  It’s hard to explain, and incredible to experience.  Her food is exciting & inspiring!     

 Pony Hole Cantina Offerings…

 

OUR GOURMET ELIXIR:  THE PONY TAIL

Slam and the Ponies along with some culinary specialists spent several months perfecting an original drink they developed just for this show.  They crafted it with love until every single taste-tester on the team gave it a “9” or a “10.”  It’s an island cocktail called a “Pony Tail,” and it’s delicious!  Some of the ingredients are:

  • Dark rum,
  • mango rum,
  • banana rum,
  • imported Hawaiian macadamia nut liquor,
  • blackberry brandy,
  • pineapple juice,
  • orange juice,
  • pomegranate juice,
  • freshly-squeezed lime juice,
  • coconut cream, &
  • a splash of Jamaican Appleton rum on top.

These are some of the ingredients that make this new island drink exciting for your tongue! 

The Pony Tail is served with multiple garnishes to titillate your senses:

  • Fruit:  orange, maraschino cherry, pineapple, blackberry, & mango
  • Flower:  edible hibiscus & dianthus flowers
  • Mineral:  edible gold flakes
  • Chef’s signature garnish:  a playful banana-dolphin
  • Served with Hawaiian umbrella & bamboo straw in gold-rimmed glass!
  • The dry ice fog effect puts this mystical Martian drink over-the-top! 

   Must try!!

 

 HUMANO GOURMET SANDWICH

Also in the Pony Hole Cantina, you may enjoy our gourmet “Humano” island sandwich.  It’s a classic Cubano with a twist.  The aliens make this Cubano.  The name “Humano” makes it sound a little suspicious… and, it’s delicious nonetheless! 

It includes:

  • Smoked Pork, marinated in lime juice & cilantro,
  • grilled, marinated pineapple,
  • dressed jicama,
  • shredded cabbage and green apple with fennel,
  • Chef Pony Shelly’s custom Cosmic Orgasm dip…
  • all served on fresh, homemade “dill-dough” bread (shaped suggestively)! 

 The aliens serve each “Humano” sandwich with a little sign on a spear, displaying names like, “Bob,” “Susan,” or “Jeff.”  Those aren’t the names of the people who ordered the sandwich.  And those aren’t the names of the people who made the sandwich.  We’re not sure who those people are.  Come to think of it, many humans have become stranded on Mars, and have disappeared.  But, the aliens reassure us that the names on the “Humanos” are placed there in reverence of the human race, and the sacrifices they have made.  It’s probably nothing.  Enjoy!

 

SNACKS

  • Sticky Fingers:  ginger chicken fingers wrapped in bamboo shoots, served on a bamboo stick, with gourmet dipping sauce.

 

GOURMET DESSERTS

  • Trojan Banana
  • Eruption Cake
  • Decadent Chocolate Mousse

 

If Gourmet’s Not Your Thing, We’ve Got You Covered…

 Stadium-style food at The Penetralium includes:

  • sliders,
  • hot dogs,
  • grilled vegetarian hotdogs,
  • Hot Wiener Slide—A combo including a hot dog with two mini sliders on round buns. 

Snacks include:

  • nachos-n-cheese,
  • fresh movie theater style popcorn,
  • snow cones (five popular flavors of Hawaiian shaved ice),
  • cotton candy, &
  • imported Hawaiian chocolate-covered Macadamia Nuts.   

 We will also have:

  • Maui Gold Pineapple Beer
  • Radio Free Pilsner
  • non-alcoholic beer
  • pinot Grigio
  • merlot
  • soft drinks
  • diet soda, &
  • Hawaiian Volcanic Water. 

 

CLUB 69 VIP LOUNGE

In addition to the Pony Hole Cantina, the Penetralium Arena also offers the Club 69 VIP Lounge (for VIP ticket holders only).  The Lounge has items that are exclusively available to VIP’s.  VIP guests may also order from the Pony Hole Cantina, and have it delivered to the VIP Lounge.


THE VIP LOUNGE INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING ITEMS:

Complimentary—

  • Moët & Chandon Brut Imperial Champagne
  • Caviar and Toast Points
  • A variety of hors d’oeuvres
  • Decadent cheeses, gourmet crackers, & fruit preserves
  • Alien Bones (Chocolate & Butterscotch melted over chow mein noodles.  Simple & delicious!) 
  • Imported Hawaiian chocolate-covered macadamia nuts
  • & additional sundries.

For a donation of Elysian Dongies:

  • Prosecco Sparkling Wine
  • Pony Beer
  • Horse Heaven Hills Red Blend
  • Pinot Grigio
  • Merlot &
  • Hawaiian Volcanic Water.

 

Food, beverages and merchandise will be available any time Slam is not performing, including during the Pre-Party, Intermissions, & After-Party (until last call).  Both the Pony Hole Cantina and the Club 69 VIP Lounge will be closed while Slam is on stage.  Must be 21+ with valid photo I.D. to drink alcohol.  No outside food or drink will be permitted on the shuttle or at the venue.

 

Pony Shelly, the World’s Horniest Chef, has been overseeing the development of the menu for this show since 7 months prior to the show date.  She will be making many exciting culinary additions between now and the show.  She will also be on premises during the show, overseeing food prep, the culinary team, the Pony Hole Cantina, & the Club 69 VIP Lounge. 

 

Seating for this show is limited!  Get your Tickets NOW!  


THE FLOW

The Shuttle Bus ride is where your briefing will take place.  The Pre-Party starts as soon as the Shuttle drops you at the venue.  You will need to use the Pre-Party to:

  • get through the “Haunted House;”
  • make it through the Escape Room;
  • find the Time-Space Portal, and successfully pass through it to ancient Mars; &...
  • once there, navigate the Scavenger Hunt to find necessary clues to fulfill your undercover mission! 

 Remember:  You’re on an important mission, and the worlds are counting on you!  No one will be able to stop you from having fun with it though…despite the presence of the Vulgarian Sentries.  There are no fun-police on Mars, per se.  It’s doubtful the Vulgarians even know what fun is.  They’re so serious all the time, making the indigenous Luxorians work in the Labian Mines, where they toil away, mining for cheese.  Maybe you can teach the Vulgarians how to let their hair down, and crack a smile.  Or, rather, grow some hair…and a mouth.  

 

 The Pre-Party will also feature:

  • themed characters,
  • musical performers,
  • gourmet themed food & drinks available for a donation of Elysian Dongies,
  • Slam Horse’s “patented” interactive immersion-theater experience,
  • themed alien games (optional), including futuristic games that electrically shock your fingers when you lose! (only for the bravest earthlings!)*
  • and more! 

*”Shock games” are not suitable for individuals with epilepsy, pace maker, heart condition, high blood pressure, or those individuals sensitive to stress.

 Those who haven’t figured out how to get back to Earth by the end of the pre-party, will have to use the intermissions, and after-party, if necessary, to finish finding the necessary clues!  There will be undercover agents ready to help you in your mission.   

 

DRUM SOLO

The Ride Hard Experience will also include Slam Horse’s special-feature performance-art drum solo!  This is the first time in over 20 years that Slam has written and performed a drum solo.  In order to come out of drum solo “retirement,” he needed a challenge.  To that end, Slam re-imagined and redefined what a drum solo can be.  You’ll never see a solo like this anywhere else!  He will be playing this on a 120-piece drum set that he custom-designed just for the Ride Hard Experience!  An experience unto itself, the solo will involve narration, live actors, and a screen show.   

 

TICKET LEVELS…

Pre-Sale with Free VIP Upgrade $39.99.  

Pre-Sale has ended.


The Stallion.  $39.99 

The Stallion Level Ticket includes:

  • general admission seating for the concert (anywhere except reserved seats),
  • access to the “haunted house,” escape room, & scavenger hunt,
  • free parking, &
  • free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (round trip).

 

The Hornymoon.  $49.99 

The Hornymoon Level ticket includes:

  • Club 69 VIP Lounge Access,
  • a complimentary Slam Horse bottle-opener keychain,
  • general admission seating (anywhere except reserved seats),
  • access to the “haunted house,” escape room, and scavenger hunt,
  • free parking, &  
  • free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (round trip).

 

The Club 69 VIP Lounge is a comfortable space to get away from it all, and relax.  Sofas and lazy boy recliners instead of metal chairs.  High-end beverages, with a complimentary spread, including caviar, champagne & hors d’oeuvres.  Concierge.  Pony Appearances. 

(See “Food and Drinks” section for a more complete listing.)

 

The HFY.  $59.99 

The HFY Level Ticket includes: 

  • a reserved front row seat for the concert,
  • backstage pass,
  • Club 69 VIP Lounge access,
  • a Slam Horse T-Shirt, 
  • first beverage complimentary,
  • access to the “haunted house,” escape room, and scavenger hunt,
  • free parking, &
  • free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (round trip). 

There are only a few HFY-level tickets left! 

           

The Nookie Monster.  $99.99

SOLD OUT!

  • Your personal choice of beverage waiting for you on the shuttle and at the venue (such as a favorite beer or soda, as availability allows).  Call Far Out Trips travel agency to coordinate:  630-492-0154)
  • Slam Horse Q&A:  You will have an opportunity to hang out with Slam at intermission
  • Brunch with Slam the morning before the show (complimentary for out-of-state / out-of country guests)
  • Pony Privileges:  you will have an opportunity to hang out in the Pony Barn while the Ponies are changing costumes
  • a reserved front row seat for the concert,
  • backstage pass,
  • Your own private VIP Lounge with hostess,
  • Club 69 VIP Lounge access,
  • a Slam Horse T-Shirt (signed by Slam), 
  • three complimentary beverages,
  • one complimentary food item (such as a gourmet sandwich),
  • access to the “haunted house,” escape room, and scavenger hunt
  • free parking, &  
  • free shuttle from the parking lot to the venue (including return trip).

Nookie Monster-level tickets are SOLD OUT!  


  • Please note:  You must be 18+ to attend this show; 21+ to drink alcohol.  Valid Photo ID is required at the shuttle and at the venue.

 

OUT-OF-STATE/OVERSEAS GUESTS

For those who require a plane flight or many hours of driving time to arrive in town, it is strongly recommended that you arrive a day early for this event.  For out-of-state/out-of-country guests, Slam Horse can arrange a block of hotel rooms in nearby Joliet, IL (less than 10 minutes drive from the venue & the free parking lot).  Please contact us ASAP if you need us to set this up.  The special hotline number for any inquiries about this show, including lodging, is:  630-492-0154 (Far Out Trips travel agency).  Guests will have to provide their own transportation from the motel to the free parking lot where the free shuttle will pick you up. 

 

SUMMARY

In summary, guests from out of state/country are recommended to arrive the day before the event.  All guests should arrive at the free parking lot at the Plainfield Public Library on August 24th at their designated time.  Your shuttle time will most likely fall between 2-4 p.m., depending upon to which group you are assigned.  Your shuttle time will be issued to you via email or standard mail, after you have purchased your tickets.  The venue is less than a mile away from the parking lot, and the shuttle will take the scenic route for about 15 minutes while an XIA agent on board briefs you on your mission, and gives you important clues.  Upon arriving at the venue, you will have to:

  • liaise with an undercover XIA agent (whom you will have to find!),
  • make it through the “haunted house,”
  • survive an escape room,
  • get through the time-space portal,
  • exchange your U.S. Dollars for Elysian Dongies,
  • find necessary clues in a scavenger hunt, 
  • work with Pony Patrol Agents, and XIA Agents to figure out a way to save the day, &
  • find a way to get back to Earth! 

 

The show itself is chock full of surprises, comedy sketches, and whimsical delights, as are the intermissions, pre-party, and after-party.  By the way, the after-party is a pajama party, so you may wish to bring an appropriate change of clothes!  (Regular attire also permitted). 

 

GET YOUR TICKETS NOW!!

 

You Have No Idea What's In Store!

Slam and the Ponies spent two years making sure this event will be stellar down to the last detail.  There is so much more to it than what we’ve shared here, but we can’t spoil all the surprises!  You have no idea what you’re in store for!  It is out of Slam’s great love for his fans that he and his team of Ponies, contract workers, & volunteers have put together this show for you.  This concert is all about the fans being the center of attention, and having a great time!  We’re looking greatly forward to seeing you on August 24th!  Remember, by the time you are reading this, Slam and the Ponies are stuck on the red planet, and they need your help!!

 

You can call the hotline number at any time if you have questions.  The hotline number is run by Far Out Trips Travel Agency:  630-492-0154.  This number will also be emailed to you after you have purchased your tickets.

 

Have a wonderful day, and we’ll see you on August 24th!

 

You must be 18+ to attend this show; 21+ to drink alcohol.  Valid Photo ID is required at the shuttle and at the venue.  No outside food or drink permitted. 

 

Please note:  If the August 24th show date becomes sold out, please contact us at:  630-492-0154, and also add your name to the wait-list on www.eventbrite.com.  With sufficient interest, we will add additional dates for the Ride Hard Experience!

 

Warning:  This show will feature flashing lights that may not be suitable for persons with epilepsy.

 

This event is not handicap accessible.

 

All details are subject to change without notice.

 

Get your tickets NOW before the show sells out!  See you on August 24th!

UPDATE:  Due to fast moving and ambiguous intelligence being gathered from XIA Agents in the field, some information in this top secret briefing may be inaccurate.  After discussions with Planetary Geologists, it is unclear if Slam Horse and his team of Pony Patrol Agents are trapped on Elysium Mons or Olympus Mons.  We have also determined that Olympus Mons is the tallest volcano in the universe, not Elysium Mons, as stated in the briefing.  We will update you as soon as we acquire new intelligence.  In the meantime, remain alert.  

--Hugh Mann, Deputy Director of Xenomorph Intelligence

name.text: Lee DeWyze
name.html: Lee DeWyze

description.text:
DOORS: 7pm  |  SHOW: 8pm
To see a detailed seat map, please choose "Tickets" in the upper righthand corner, select your ticket choices & click "view on map."
TICKETS GO ON-SALE TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC FRI, MAY 24, at 10AM CT

ABOUT THE ARTIST
Genre: Singer-songwriter 
After winning American Idol Season 9, singer-songwriter Lee DeWyze’s real breakout moment came when he wrote an original song for The Walking Dead. “Blackbird Song” has over 10Million YouTube views collectively, and 5M Spotify streams. The single has gone on to sell more than 100k copies and was considered one of the top 10 most influential syncs in 2014 from the Musicians Guild of America. 
Since the release of “Blackbird Song” in 2014, Lee has gone on to have more than 35 syncs and placements in TV shows such as Elementary, Suits, The Fosters, Nashville, Reign, Hart of Dixie, Bull, and many others. His song “Don’t Be Afraid” was the national campaign song for 2 years for Blue Cross Blue Shield, and ESPN used his song “The Ride” in several NASCAR commercials. His song “Fight” which was on the Hot AC Top 40 chart for 10 weeks straight was featured in the highly acclaimed independent movie, Sister. Lee also won an award from the LA Indie Film Festival for his video for the song “Fight”, which he wrote and directed himself. 
In 2016, Lee released his album “Oil and Water” which received high praise from both Billboard and Huffington Post, and was also considered a top 10 album of the year by PopDose Magazine.
Lee also released the single, “Weight” in Dec of 2016, which was featured in the season finale of CBS’ Elementary. Originally written for the feature “Collateral Beauty”, this song was a turning point in Lee’s writing career. 
In June of 2017, Lee signed a publishing deal with SONGS publishing (home to Lorde, The Weeknd, Diplo). His new single “The Breakdown” was released on July 21st, 2017.
When not in his studio writing, Lee is consistently touring the US, performing over 100 shows per year for the past 4 years. He has most recently opened for Lady Antebellum, and also performed at The Sundance Film Festival, The Grammy Foundation, MusiCares, and SXSW. 

Website

FAQs
PLEASE CLICK HERE FOR A DETAILED FAQ.
Are there ID or minimum age requirements to enter the event? Unless otherwise indicated, all of our shows are all ages. Please bring a valid ID.
What are my transportation/parking options for getting to and from the event? Residential street parking is free after 6pm Monday through Saturday. Street parking is free on Sunday. Metered parking is free after 9pm. SPACE is located one block east of the Dempster Purple Line Stop. 
What can I bring into the event? SPACE has a full bar with an exciting array of cocktails and an extensive beer list. While we do not serve food in our venue, customers are welcome to bring in pizza from Union, the restaurant up front. No outside food or beverages are allowed inside.
How can I contact the organizer with any questions? For questions regarding your order, please email boxoffice@evanstonspace.com or call 847.492.8860.
What's the refund policy? All tickets are non-refundable.

name.text: Annie Sellick and Pat Bergeson with special guest Richard Smith
name.html: Annie Sellick and Pat Bergeson with special guest Richard Smith

description.text:
The Venue is excited to present... Annie Sellick and Pat Bergeson with special guest Richard Smith
For more information about The Venue, please visit our website.
Doors open at 6PM. Headliner at 7PM.
Advance tickets are: $25 Reserved Table seating ($30 at the door)$20 Cocktail Seating ($25 at the door)$15 General Admission ($20 at the door)
ABOUT THE ARTIST
Nashville-native dread-locked jazz-vocalist Annie Sellick has performed and recorded with most of her heroes (including Joey DeFrancesco, Bela Fleck and Mark O' Connor), enjoyed stardom in her hometown and toured nationally and internationally.  But perhaps her best quality is the organic sincerity she exudes from the stage, hooking an audience into the stories of the songs she sings.
Rounding out the duo, Annie's husband is as versatile a harmonica player as he is a guitarist.  Pat Bergeson moved to Nashville upon Chet Atkins' request to join his band and has performed and recorded with a long list of chart toppers like Dolly Parton, Johnny Cash and Michael McDonald, not to mention tours with and cult favorites Lyle Lovett, Madeleine Peyroux. 
Together, Annie and Pat cover much musical ground with jazz standards, soulful originals and cabaret classics. The pair brings a high level of skill, confidence, ease and charm to each show gaining fans and followers wherever they perform. The music is jazz-based with acoustic guitars, harmonica and some percussion but draws upon many styles creating a show that grooves, soothes and tells stories.
ALSO FEATURINGRICHARD SMITH
Richard started playing the guitar at age 5 and has never looked back. Focusing early on with the fingerstyle guitar of Chet Atkins and Jerry Reed, he began transcribing classical music, Jazz, the gypsy style of Django Reinhardt, bluegrass, ragtime and the blues to Sousa marches. Now a seasoned performer in his forties with thousands of performances worldwide to his credit.  In 2018, Richard performed in five continents... North and South America, Europe, Asia and Australia including performances with and alongside Tommy Emmanuel, Eric Clapton, Albert Lee, Dave Peacock, Martin Taylor, Brent Mason, Gary Brooker, Stuart Duncan, Bryan Sutton, Joe Brown, Ralph McTell and many others.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RCGGG9piAGY

https://www.richardsmithmusic.com/home

name.html: Summer Nights Outdoor Concert Series - The Doors of Chicago, August 28

description.text:
Join us every Wednesday night this summer for our Summer Nights Outdoor Concert Series.
Wednesday, August 28The Doors of Chicago (Doors Tribute)

Reservations are FREE and highly recommended. Reservations must arrive by 7pm, show starts at 8pm.
 
FAQs
 
Are there ID or minimum age requirements to enter the event?
The concert is open to all ages, but in order to drink alcohol, guest musts be 21+ and proper ID is required.
 
What are my transport/parking options for getting to and from the event?
We offer a parking lot directly in front of our building. During some events, we may have on valet, which is always free to our guests to use in the event that our front lot is full. We are located just west of Kedzie on 115th Street.
 
How can I contact the organiser with any questions?
Simply email Rachel at rachel@115bourbonstreet.com or give her a call at 708-388-8881.
 
Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event?
No, we will have your table reservation, there is no need to print anything.
 
Can I update my registration information?
Absolutely!  However, after 10am on the morning of the event, you will have to call in any changes 708-388-8881.

name.text: Shoe Fest Music and Camping 2019
name.html: Shoe Fest Music and Camping 2019

description.text:
Shoe Fest is a 3 day music and camping outdoor festival held at Camp Shaw-Waw-Nas-See in Manteno, IL taking place August 30 - September 1, 2019.
Shoe Fest began in 2011 and continues to grow each year.  The festival has three stages of music, with an emphasis on roots music; such as folk, folk rock, bluegrass, and jamband. 
IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Shoe Fest Gates open at 10AM CST on Friday, August 30, 2019.
The Box Office will be open 10am-12am Friday, 9am-12am Saturday and 9am to 10pm on Sunday.  You will ONLY be able to enter the festival during open Box Office Hours.
Shoe Fest does not allow any kind of glass on the premises, vehicles will be searched upon entry.
Children under the age of 12 may enter Shoe Fest free of charge.
Shoe Fest is not a camp with your car festival, you must park in a designated parking area and camp within the festival grounds.
Once your purchase a ticket, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of Shoe Fest.  If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, please check your spam/junk mail folder.  If you still do not have the email, please contact Eventbrite help center here.
All sales are final, there are no refunds or exchanges.  
Artists and schedule subject to change.
Event is rain or shine. 
All RV & Cabin tickets must accompany a 3 Day, Sat/Sun, Sun Only or Volunteer pass in order to enter the festival grounds.
Only 3 Day, Sat/Sun, Sun Only or Volunteer passes are exchangeable for a festival wristband.

DISCLAIMER
Shoe Fest holds no responsibility for lost or stolen tickets.  Shoe Fest will take place rain or shine.  This ticket is exchangeable for the specific Shoe Fest Day Camping and Music ticket you have purchased (either 3 Day Pass, Sat/Sun, Sun Only, RV Pass, Cabin or Volunteer Deposit) and not an individual artists' performance.  No refunds will be offered for any change in schedule, talent cancellations, weather issues or otherwise.  Artist Line up and schedule subject to change.  
All ticket holders understand this is an outdoor camping festival in a natural environment, with no manmade changes to the grounds.  Ticket holders will acknowledge that camping and weather can create risk of injury or death due to the environment and agrees to attend at ticket holder's own risk.  By choosing to attend Shoe Fest, all ticket holders agree to hold Shoe Fest LLC, Northern Illinois Camp Association, Camp Shaw Waw Nas See and all involved parties harmless in the incident of injury or death.

All ticket holders understand this is an outdoor camping festival in a natural environment, with no manmade changes to the grounds.  Ticket holders will acknowledge that camping and weather can create risk of injury or death due to the environment and agrees to attend at ticket holder's own risk.  By choosing to attend Shoe Fest, all ticket holders agree to hold Shoe Fest LLC, Northern Illinois Camp Association, Camp Shaw Waw Nas See and all involved parties harmless in the incident of injury or death.

description.text:
We are kicking off the Labor Day Weekend with THE ULTIMATE LABOR DAY BLACK PARTY at Universal Entertainment Center! FRIDAY, AUGUST 30, 2019  8pm-2amIt's our 5th year in bringing you a great evening for the "Grown & Sexy"!  THANK YOU for attending last year! We Got Bigger! Featuring More grand seating, plenty of free parking, Cigar Bar, Patio Party Area, Cash Bar and more! 6 DJs, FOOD AVAILABLE, RAFFLES, DOOR PRIZES, DRINK SPECIALS, BOTTLE SERVICE & More! This will be ANOTHER EPIC Evening for sure! People are coming from all over the country and even from other countries to attend this very big Annual Labor Day Weekend.So make your plans now and join in on the fun, the laughter, the fellowship and the memories! Advance Tickets:$15, $25 at the door!  Call Quentin for VIP Booths & VIP Tables! (They are going fast)  Bottles on sale for $125. Limited Vendor Space is available! Call us! 
Note: VIP Tables and Booths are separate from the general admission price of the ticket! NO REFUNDS! We have the right to refuse anyone! No refunds will be given! Bad Behavior will be escorted out by Event Security! This is a Grown & Sexy Party so please act accordley! VIP Tables & Booths; Contact Quentin 773-620-7746  or Jeff 410-258-8638
